No. 017・ Xmas Session IPA

Brew notes coming soon!

Recipe

Vol: 10L
Mash: 60 min @ 66°C
Yeast: Mangrove Jacks M44 - US West Coast
Targets:

OG FG ABV IBU EBC
1.047 1.009 5% 23 16

Recipe according to style American IPA style guide:

1.047

FG

1.009

5%

1. Mash

Grain Weight

Ca Mg Na Cl SO4 Cl:SO4
110 20 14 50 275 0.18
